server.rest.controllers

Class HRPositionRoleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.rest.controllers.Controller
      • server.rest.controllers.HRPositionRoleController

  • @CrossOrigin(origins={"http://localhost:1234","http://theterminal.s3-website.us-west-2.amazonaws.com"})
 @RestController
public class HRPositionRoleController
extends Controller
    Controller for Position Role table in the database Provides all the REST endpoints related to HR Position Roles and stored SQL procedures
